post.body: the car protested turning over at 6 below this AM. Engine oil was thick like honey.
Thanks for voting no .. now if you can just get most of that wasted 700 billion back too ...
'Salty' in the USN means 'wise, experienced, capable'
that storm went thru here Monday night to. We got 6 inches of drifting snow above an inch of ice and sub zero temps oh joy
cool. I have a boat dock that I need to drag out of the frozen lake. You just passed the first test
we finished 200 acres of terraced hilly ground in between snow storms. Only 80 acres left and it is close and almost flat!
I still have George Carpenter in my yahoo list and Lost Cherry friend list
if you need me just call. What are friends for?
have a great work break
I considered going out to service my snow moving accts. Decided that they arent that bad that they can wait til the AM
I planted garlic here a couple years ago. It sure has taken off! More proflific than the mint
JUST started snowing here at 8:30 will see how accurate the weather guessers are in the morning.
they forecase ice then over a foot of snow this afternoon and tonite but there is still clear skies here.
they are forecasting 11-15 inches here tonite
so you are looking for somebody to oil rassle with you?
8 inches of snow in a place not accostomed to it .. good day to play in the snow & watch the demolition derby on the TV News
just started to snow. 4Cast an all day event. So I will check at noon if I need to move any of it. Tues Thurs and Friday good revenue WK.
HEAT WAVE !! it just got above zero for today ! YAY
50 dregree temps swamped out the fields. Frozen worked much better as far has hauling heavy loads around.
Temps started off at 25 degrees on Thurs. Got into the 50's FRI/SAT and then dropped to subzero within 4 hours on Sunday.
finished the corn that we could get to. Last 7 acres is on the bad side of a washed out creek crossing. Deer food stand by first glance.
6 yrs proved too much for key denim pants. Just bought some carhart fleece lined pants! Talk about cozy, these are it.
up at 3 am to check drifitng overnight. 6 below zero. It didnt get into positive temp numbers until well after 8 am
6 inches of snow over night. I had 8 hours of work in B4 noon. Hopefully Creston Area didn't get as much so we can finish the harvest.
spent 2 days in a hotel and scored tones of body/bath products ! fun singin put da lime in da coconut while in the shower for an hr
got the two most difficult fields done. Last field is nearly level ground with no flooded areas.
back from farming down south. got 200 acres harvested only 80 left to go. When this latest snow storm finishes we might actually finish
thinking this stuff would make an awesome ice cream float
spent all day loading trucks with snow! At least they can use large parts of thier lumberyard until it snows again. Another full day Fri.
second day of snow hauling done. Starting again early Am to finish mid afternoon. Enough to do that I could work on christmas also.
I swear school teachers are half retarded. 4 foot tall pile of snow means "dont park there, use one of the OTHER 45 cleared parking slots"
snowed last night 3 am mad dash to town to retrieve the machine so I can clean up and then take it back to town. Helper napping til noon.
change of plans. headed up to haul snow piles for the next 2 days. I am going to have christmas revenue afterall.
5 hrs into my work day! 16 below zero. Now I can finish soldering these computer parts wires. Still have steel panels to hang Next wk too
made plans for my next tattoo. should have my right arm sleeved before the end of January
perfect huge flake snow event happening right now. not leaving much just picture book peaceful to see.
we ended up with about 8 inches. 11 hours later I am wiped out from moving snow. Still have steel to hang. Maybe Saturday morning B4 next 1
Snow Thunder and Lightning ! Something wicked this way comes
going to hang some sheet steel B4 the next snow storm. 6 sheets wont take long.
Tones Spice botched a batch of Garlic Salt so they donated it to the DOT road dept for ice control. Roads smell REAL good around Ames IA
